query: (Background: "medullary thyroid carcinoma"^4 OR MTC OR Doc_title: "medullary thyroid carcinoma"^4 OR MTC) AND (Background: RET^4 OR "HSCR1" OR "MEN2A" OR "MEN2B" OR "CDHF12" OR "CDHR16" OR "RET-ELE1" OR Doc_title: RET^4 OR "HSCR1" OR "MEN2A" OR "MEN2B" OR "CDHF12" OR "CDHR16" OR "RET-ELE1") AND (Background: "treatment" OR "therapy" OR "Surgery" OR "Radiation" OR "Protein kinase inhibitors")
